description: This file defines authentication-related API endpoints for user signup, login, and retrieval of current user info in a FastAPI application. It manages user creation, token generation, and user authentication.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Data model representing a user in the database.

classes.name: TokenResponse
classes.description: Schema for token response containing the access token and token type.

classes.name: UserCreate
classes.description: Schema for creating a new user, including email and password.

classes.name: UserLogin
classes.description: Schema for user login payload with email and password.

classes.name: UserOut
classes.description: Schema for returning user profile information.

methods.name: TokenResponse signup(payload: UserCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Creates a new user with hashed password and returns a JWT token.

methods.name: TokenResponse login(payload: UserLogin, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token.

methods.name: UserOut me(current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Returns the profile of the currently authenticated user.

ctags.name: login
ctags.pattern: /^def login(payload: UserLogin, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> TokenResponse:$/

ctags.name: signup
ctags.pattern: /^def signup(payload: UserCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> TokenResponse:$/
